archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.6.6: Where passwords are used to supplement token authentication (e.g. to access a physical token or for fall-back purposes) good password practices should be applied, such as preventing the use of weak passwords, changing passwords regularly and locking the token after a set number of unsuccessful authentication attempts (to protect against brute force login attempts).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
